instructions: Heat oven to 425Ëš. In large bowl combine flour, baking powder and sugar. Cut in shortening until crumbly. Stir in milk just until moistened. Turn dough onto lightly floured surface; knead until smooth (1 minute). Roll out dough to \({3 \over 4}\)-inch thickness. Cut into 2-inch biscut. Place an inch apart on cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 14 minutes or until lightly browned.
